DOC.brief_title: Open Label Phase II Study BAY 43-9006 Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia ( CML ) Patients Resistant Gleevec
DOC.criteria: Have Philadelphia chromosome positive chronic myelogenous leukemia ( CML ) chronic phase , per IBMTR criterion Have document hematologic resistance Gleevec ( Imatinib ) follow prior hematologic response Gleevec administer dos least 400 mg/d least 3 month . Have WBC > 20 x 109/L study entry Have ECOG performance status . Status 0 , 1 2 Have anticipate survival least 16 week . Be able comply study procedure followup examination . Signed informed consent must obtain prior study specific procedure . Exclusion Criteria : Congestive heart failure > class II define New York Heart Association Functional Classification ( NYHA ) Cardiac arrhythmia require antiarrythmics ( exclude beta blocker digoxin ) Active coronary artery disease ischemia History HIV infection chronic hepatitis B C Active clinically serious infection ( > grade 2 NCICTC ) Patients seizure disorder require antiepileptic drug History solid organ allograft
